content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a jungle fence, I need to craft jungle planks first. Jungle planks require a stripped_jungle_wood block, so I will first move the stripped_jungle_wood block from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle planks, I can move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a jungle fence, I need to place jungle planks on either side of a stick. I will start by moving one jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Next I will move the stick from slot 33 to slot 2. This will complete the left part of the fence.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 3 to complete the fence.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a second jungle fence, I will move another jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Next I will move the stick from slot 33 to slot 5. This will complete the middle part of the second fence.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 6 to complete the second fence.

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 45, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 18, "index": 29}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 33, "index": 37}]
thought: Now I will move the three jungle fences from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
